titles.title: Breathe On Me Breath Of God

properties.copyright: 1970 Josef Weinberger Ltd, Administered by Josef Weinberger Ltd

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Breathe on me breath of God
Fill me with life anew
That I may love the things You love
And do what You would do

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Breathe on me breath of God
Until my heart is pure
Until with You I will one will
To do and to endure

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Breathe on me breath of God
Till I am one with You
Your fire of love shall glow in me
My earthbound soul renew

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Breathe on me breath of God
So shall I never die
But live with You the perfect life
For all eternity
